entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Pontiac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
